original_text: Someone may slap you on one side of your face. Then you should let him slap the other side of your face too. Someone may take away your coat. If he does, do not stop him from taking your shirt too.
korean_text: 너의 이 뺨을 치는 자에게 저 뺨도 돌려대며 네 겉옷을 빼앗는 자에게 속옷도 거절하지 말라

sentences.original_text: on one side of your face

sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 그가 하도록 내버려두어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: slap the other side of your face too
Someone may take away your coat
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 당신의 겉옷을 빼앗아 갈 수 있습니다
